resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105925</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105925</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207044</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water Uses and Children's Lives in East Africa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser-Gebrauch und Leben der Kinder in Ostafrika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisations de l'eau et vies des enfants en 
Afrique de l'Est</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usos da água e vidas das crianças em África do 
leste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usi dell'acqua e vite dei bambini in Africa 
orientale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρήσεις ύδατος και ζωές των παιδιών στην Ανατολική 
Αφρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aplicaciones del agua y vidas de los niños en 
África del este</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">asks students to compare their interactions with water to those of children in Kenya and Tanzania and discover that access to water helps to define children's roles in the family. They can then demonstrate their understanding through essays and pictures.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bittet Kursteilnehmer, ihre Interaktionen mit 
Wasser mit denen der Kinder in Kenia und in Tanzania zu vergleichen 
und zu entdecken, daß Zugriff zum Wasser hilft, Rollen der Kinder in 
der Familie zu definieren. Sie können ihr Verständnis durch 
Versuche und Abbildungen dann zeigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">demande à des étudiants de comparer leurs 
interactions à l'eau à ceux des enfants au Kenya et en Tanzanie et 
de découvrir que l'accès à l'eau aide à définir les rôles des 
enfants dans la famille. Ils peuvent alors démontrer leur 
arrangement par des essais et des images.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pede que os estudantes comparem suas interações 
com água àquelas das crianças em Kenya e em Tanzânia e descubram 
que o acesso à água ajuda definir papéis das crianças na família.
Podem então demonstrar sua compreensão através dos essays e 
dos retratos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chiede agli allievi di paragonare le loro 
interazioni ad acqua a quelle dei bambini nel Kenia ed in Tanzania e 
di scoprire che l'accesso ad acqua contribuisca a definire i ruoli dei
bambini nella famiglia. Possono allora dimostrare la loro 
comprensione attraverso i saggi e le immagini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζητά από τους σπουδαστές για να συγκρίνει τις 
αλληλεπιδράσεις τους με το ύδωρ σε εκείνοι των παιδιών στην Κένυα
και την Τανζανία και να ανακαλύψει ότι η πρόσβαση στο ύδωρ βοηθά
να καθορίσει τους ρόλους των παιδιών στην οικογένεια. 
Μπορούν έπειτα να καταδείξουν την κατανόησή τους μέσω των 
δοκίμιων και των εικόνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pide que los estudiantes comparen sus 
interacciones con agua a las de niños en Kenia y Tanzania y que 
descubran que el acceso al agua ayuda a definir los papeles de los 
niños en la familia. Pueden entonces demostrar su comprensión 
a través de ensayos y de cuadros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207044</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105925</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/water-uses-and-childrens-lives-in-east-africa</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
